remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作區是系統工作列，或應用程式桌面工具列不會遮住的螢幕部分。The work area is the portion of the screen that is not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars. 對應至 SPI_GETWORKAREA。Maps to SPI_GETWORKAREA. 請參閱[SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp)。See [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*物件屬性*="{SystemParameters.WorkArea`}`"/ ><*object property*="{ SystemParameters.WorkArea`}`"/>
